alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 27 at 9:56AM PDT until October 27 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Most of the Rogue, Illinois, and Applegate Valleys. Additionally, the southern portions of the Umpqua Valley. This includes the cities and communities of Medford, Talent, Ashland, Jacksonville, Butte Falls, Shady Cove, White City, Gold Hill, Rogue River, Applegate, Williams, Ruch, Grants Pass, Selma, Cave Junction, Obrien, Azalea, Glendale, and Tiller. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some colder spots, especially in the southern end of the Illinois Valley around Obrien and Takilma, portions of the Applegate Valley and in the foothills could see temperatures reach freezing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
